entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 04:34 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C

Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %

Dewpoint: -7.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
